article.class: fl-post post-55476 page type-page status-publish hentry

div.p: (L-R) Lee Lewis, County Manager; Daryl Edwards, District 3; Charlie Leggett, District 5, Theodore Wilkerson, District 2; (Seated) Ronnie Rentz, District 4; Lewis Parker, Chairman; Sarah Boatright, District 1.

Welcome to Appling County, where hometown friendliness still shines through a spectacular setting. Many of our local leaders were raised in our area and others have brought a wealth of experienced from other places to expand the vision in Appling County. You are never far from an outdoor adventure with the Altamaha River, Moody Forest Natural Area, Lake Mayers and Dunn's Lake at your fingertips to provide endless experiences. While maintaining our Southern hospitality, we are preparing for the future as a vibrant multicultural community. So get to know us, we have room for you to grow.

The County Commissioners meet the first Tuesday of each month in the Commissioners' meeting room at the Courthouse Annex building. For information about meetings please contact the County Administrative office at (912) 367-8100
